description: Try our easy to follow Berry & Rhubarb Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Berry pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Summer,Strawberry,Dairy free,Peanut free,Rhubarb
name: Berry & Rhubarb Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a 24 x 30cm Swiss roll pan with baking paper. Roll out half the pastry between 2 sheets of baking paper until large enough to line base and sides of pan. Line pan with pastry. Refrigerate for 15 minutes.
Meanwhile, combine berries, rhubarb, sugar and cornflour in a large bowl. Toss to coat.
Roll remaining pastry between 2 sheets of baking paper until large enough to cover pan. Cut small stars (about 15) from pastry and reserve.

Fill pastry case with berry mixture. Cover with pastry top. Press edges together with a fork to seal. Brush top with a little egg. Arrange reserved pastry stars on top and brush with a little egg. Sprinkle with extra sugar.
Bake for 1 hour or until pastry is golden and crisp. Serve warm or cold.
